subject: Re: [junit] Help,what's wrong with my TDD practice in my daily life?
msgSnippet: ... Same here. I don t recall such an event. As usual, a concrete example would be enlightening. Lasse -- Lasse Koskela * Author of Test Driven (Manning
messageBody:
On 9/10/07, Ilja Preuss <it@...> wrote:
> Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> > The downside of TDD is that you can end up writing a lot of tests for
> > business code that you quickly throw away and rewrite, so the amount
> > of churn can be quite high.
>
> I've never seen that happen. We must be doing things quite differently.

Same here. I don't recall such an event.

As usual, a concrete example would be enlightening.

Lasse

--
Lasse Koskela
* Author of "Test Driven" (Manning Publications, 2007) *
* Reaktor Innovations * http://www.ri.fi/en *
